block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: In Today's video we are going to learn how to fold an origami Peacock designed by Kunihiko Kasahara. This model is really unique and simple. Give it a try! Here at Heap Art, we are trying to inspire people to connect using origami. If you like origami and if you like paper airplanes, please remember to subscribe. I will be delivering something new to you every week. Use the following link to subscribe to my channel: https://www.youtube.com/c/heapart?sub_confirmation=1 I have an upload schedule, I upload 3 times a week! Every Tuesday, I'll upload a new paper airplane which is part of my 100 exotic paper airplane series. Every Friday, I'll upload a new Origami Model never seen on this channel before Every Sunday, I'll upload a bonus video either a Vlog or another Origami Model that is slightly more complicated. Remember to subscribe so you don't miss any of my tutorials! Thanks for watching.
